name: Roses in the Snow Cocktail
description: The delicate aroma of roses is the star in this variation on a Gin Fizz cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin, lemon, simple syrup, rosewater, and eggwhite to a cocktail shaker. Dry shake (without ice) to incorporate eggwhite, about 30 seconds. Fill shaker with ice and shake until frothy, about 30 seconds longer.
Double strain by pouring through a bar strainer into a fine-mesh or conical strainer set in a highball glass filled with ice. Top drink with club soda and bitters. Gently stir and serve.
